name: Kor Blademaster
originalText:
Double strike
Equipped Warriors you control have double strike.

rulings.text: If a creature loses double strike after assigning damage in the first strike combat damage step (due to Kor Blademaster leaving the battlefield, for example), that creature won’t assign damage in the normal combat damage step.

text:
